snippet: “Anti-Establishment” and “From 199A to 199B: Liam Gillick” are part of Bard College’s events celebrating the 20th anniversary of its Center for Curatorial Studies and Art in Contemporary Culture.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibitions Anti-Establishment and From 199A to 199B: Liam Gillick at the Hessel Museum at Bard College.
lead_paragraph: “Anti-Establishment” and “From 199A to 199B: Liam Gillick” are part of Bard College’s events celebrating the 20th anniversary of its Center for Curatorial Studies and Art in Contemporary Culture.

headline.seo: ‘Anti-Establishment’ and Liam Gillick’s Work at Bard
headline.main: Art Begetting Art, and Social Commentary, Too
headline.print_headline: Art Begetting Art, and Social Commentary, Too
